Smart Lighting

This lighting project can be used for everything from display cases to under cabinets and in drawers. You'll be able to control your lights by switch or on a secure website. If you choose your LEDs carefully you can even control the colour of your lights.



The tutorial that I followed was by Some ppl Ppl

Rating

  • Difficulty of Project:Easy
  • Cost:
  • Recommendation skill level: Beginner

Skills and assumed supplies

  • Ability to copy onto the board
  • Desktop or laptop Computer with administrative access
  • Soldering

Supplies and costs

  • ESP8266
  • LED lights
  • Power Cord for Lights
